content:
[PAGE 1]
CITY OF CUPERTINO AUDIT COMMITTEE
SPECIAL MEETING
January 25, 2026

CALL TO ORDER

ITEM 1: FISCAL UPDATE
Finance staff reviewed quarterly revenue performance and expenditure controls.
Committee requested additional variance detail for capital projects over $1M.

[PAGE 2]
ACTION
Motion to accept fiscal update and forward recommendations to City Council.
Vote: Motion carried.

ITEM 2: INTERNAL CONTROL WORKPLAN
Discussion on procurement controls and grant documentation readiness.

ADJOURNMENT
